To: Full-time Local Year One undergraduate students


A. Selection Criteria

The selection of the Awardees shall be based on the following merits:
Good academic achievement in public examinations;
Obtaining CGA of 3.50 or above as of Fall Term (Winter Term is NOT included) in the 2016/17 academic year;
Proven record in extra-curricular activities and community services; and
Enthusiasm for developing all-round qualities including the acquisition of foreign language(s) and contribution in community services.
B. Awards

Each successful applicant shall be awarded a renewable scholarship of HK$80,000 p.a. for the normal duration of study, subject to the fulfillment of all the offer conditions and the renewal conditions. The recipients are required to follow the special scholarship terms as stipulated for the Hong Kong Award.

Best regards,
Scholarships & Financial Aid Office
HKUST
